**ğŸ»PhantaBear x AlpacadabrazğŸ¦™The Voice of nature Singing Battle 2022 - Team PhantaBear Internal Selection begins!**

Here is a singing battle in the forest between Team Alpacadabraz and Team PhantaBear, we are excited to see who will be winning this **"Voice of nature Singing Battle"**!
Seeded singers, it is your chance to sing and represent Team PhantaBear for this singing battle
Demo screening will be conducted and 10 candidates will be shortlisted to be the finalist in this single battle. Professional training by experts in the Music industry will be offered to the finalists on song selection and equipment recommendations, similar experience to a professional singer getting ready for a contest.

ğŸ¤**Event Rundown**
<t:1650954060:D> - <t:1651818060:D>: Demo submission

<t:1652250060:D>: Song selection and equipment recommendations
<t:1652422860:D>: Rehearsal

**How to Enter**
From now on until <t:1651852740:F>,record a Demoï¼ˆMP3 format) and upload to <#968435624577224734>
**Rules and Regulations**
a.  Your Demo should be limited to 3 minutes or less
b.  There is on limit on participant count per entry, it can be solo, choir or vocal group
c.  You are free to use any recording requirement to submit your entry (the submission will need to be in mp3 format)
d.  Ghosting is strictly prohibited

**âš ï¸Please note**âš ï¸
a. This activity is available to #PhantaBear holders only.
b. The Organizer reserves the right to disqualify any entrant who it believes has breached any of these rules and regulations.
c. The organizers reserve the right to amend, change, cancel or re-define the event as required.

â­ï¸**Judicial panel and their profile**
**Mr. Ling Wai Manï½œMusic producer/Songwriter/backing vocalist**
He participated in the album production, singing, chorus writing, and recording of singers such as Wakin Chau, Jacky Cheung, Leo Ku, Eason Chan, A-Lin, etc. and published a good amount of popular pieces. He is the designated concert harmony coordinator for the concert tours of Jay Chou. 
**Mr. AKï½œMusic Director & professional guitarist**
The guitarist of music band <Starry eyes> since 1983. He has been in the music industry for more than 36 years and collaborated with a lot of very famous singers, including Simon Hsueh, Chyi Yu, Lo Ta-yu, Shunza, Sky Wu, Chang Shin-che, Jay Chou, etc. He has also been appointed as the Music Jury of Golden Melody Awards.

**4. PhantaBear Holdersâ€™ vote - Incentive distributions to our <@&921733712813637652>  and <@&955005907455078450> **
The new project team members have conducted a few internal discussions and evaluated the current approach on incentive distributions to our Mod Team and Community Builders on a monthly basis. A community vote by the community members will determine the upcoming reward plan for our Mod Team and Community Builders.

ğŸ”¸Duration:<t:1652249460:D> - <t:1652889540>
ğŸ”¸Topic: Shall we utilize the funds in Phanta Treasure for the rewards of our Mod team and Community Builders?
ğŸ”¸Options:
a. Yes, we appreciate the contributions made by the project team & the Mod Team, part of the funds from Phanta Treasure should be used for rewarding the Mod Team and Community Builders with the existing approach.
b. Yes, each of our Mod Team and Community Team members will receive a monthly reward valued at 0.4 ETH. All these rewards will be funded by Phanta Treasure and the management team will review the headcount to facilitate the community building and development.
c. No, the funds of Phanta Treasure will not be used on rewarding the Mod Team and Community Builders. Instead, other perks and incentives will be offered to the team as a token of appreciation.

Please move to <#947400708494336000> channel to cast your vote on the topic aboveğŸ»**(#PhantaBear holders Only)**

Moving forward, we would like to provide a clear definition of how the project team and community team will distribute the tasks to keep this project moving. We believe this combination would help to craft a better culture for the PhantaBear project and lead to great success!

ğŸ¨**2022 PhantaBear Fashion Design Awards**ğŸ–Œï¸

Dear Bearos,

We sincerely invite all the talented and artistic Bearos to join our very first fashion design competition to customize clothing and accessories exclusively for PhantaBear designs. Let's see your cool, stylish and confident clothing designs for our Bearos.

We are also delighted to announce that Ric, the director of the trendy brand **PHANTACi**, and **Daniel Wong**, an internationally renowned designer, will act as judges to help us identify the rising star of fashion design from the PhantaBear community. What makes it even more exciting is that the total prize money could reach up to approximately USD$4,000. Bearos, pitch your creative idea and see if youâ€™ll win one of the awards!


âœ¨ **Qualification**
All contestants and voters MUST be PhantaBear or PhancyPetsâ€™ holders.

âœ¨**Awards and Prizes**
**Special Jury Prize**ï¼š1ETH + 8% of Clothing Sales Profit

**Popularity Award**
1st Placeï¼š0.5 ETH + 8% of Clothing Sales Profit
2nd Placeï¼š0.3 ETH + 8% of Clothing Sales Profit
3rd Placeï¼š0.2 ETH + 8% of Clothing Sales Profit
4th Place ï¼šPhancy Pets * 1
5th Placeï¼šPhancy Pets * 1

âœ¨**Timeline**
6/2-6/21    ï½œEntry Submission
6/22-6/28 ï½œJudging & Scoring
6/29            ï½œFinalists Annoucement
6/29-7/3    ï½œBearoâ€™s Voting
7/4               ï½œWinners Announcement

âœ¨**How to apply ?**
1. Please design the t-shirt, hoodie, socks, hat based on the pattern provided: https://reurl.cc/LmnV04
2. File Naming: Discord User Name_Category  e.g. Sam#2223_Hoodie
3. Participants can send multiple submissions.
4. Please upload your work by filling out the form: https://forms.gle/ag6AvXutCYwYUKZu7

âœ¨**Judging Criteria**
Based on the following criteria, the jury selects 10 outstanding pieces that are innovative and visually aesthetic for popular vote.

- Theme 30%
- Innovation 30%
- Aesthetics 20%
- Artist Statement 10 %
- Completeness 10%

ğŸ‘€ **Please note:**
1. Freehand drawing is acceptable. Feel free to let your imagination run wild and create anything you want with your design.
2. Participants can send multiple submissions. Submissions that do not meet the provided format may be rejected.
3. Each participant can only win one award at most. As such, the recipient of the Special Jury Prize will not qualify for the Popularity Award. In the case that the recipient of the Special Jury Prize is also one of the top 5 winners of the Popularity Award, the next participant with the most votes will receive the award.
4. All entries submitted must be original and cannot infringe on the Intellectual Property Rights of any party. Entrant shall indemnify the organizer against all actions, costs, claims and liabilities in connection with any allegation or claim of infringement of any IPR of any party.
 Plagiarism is strictly prohibited in the event.
5. Entries must not contain pornography; abusive, offensive or hateful imagery or language; harassing or defamatory content.
6.This event is planned and based on the proposal from the winner of the Online Community Event Proposal Competition. The prizes will be paid by Phanta Treasure.
7. The organizer reserves the right to make alterations to the winning design, and may choose not to use in-whole or in-part the winning design.
8. Participants agree to the above rules and regulations when participating in the event. The organizer reserves the right to make final changes, alterations, interpretations, and cancellations to the event.

ğŸ–Œï¸ **2022 PhantaBear Fashion Design Awards**ğŸ¨ 

Dear Bearos,

PhantaBear Fashion Design Awards are getting into full swing. This is a great opportunity for you to showcase your talents and design skills.
Not only can you win thousands of dollars in prizes but also make your fashion dream come true. Most importantly, the competition will include a panel of celebrity guest judges: Ric, the co-founder of the trendy brand PHANTACi, and Daniel Wong, an internationally renowned designer.

â­ **Ric - Co-founder of International Fashion Brand PHANTACi**

He and his friend Jay Chou, the mandopop king, jointly created the world-renowned street brand PHANTACi, which partnered with EzekClub to launch the PhantaBear NFT collection with music, art and fashion as the core values. Ric has led international collaboration projects with Disney, Stussy, Nike, Starbucks, etc., and has always been at the forefront of street fashion. As a fashion trend leader, Ric positions and steers the brand tone and voice of PHANTACi, giving the brand vitality. Having survived in the fashion industry and maintained his unshakable position in the past 20 years, Ric believes that simply "being yourself" and not following the crowd is the "true" trend. Ric shares everything he loves in daily life via PHANTACi and provides fashionistas with edgy fashion choices and lifestyle inspirations, encouraging them to pursue their very own styles.

â­ **Daniel Wong - Genius Celebrity Designer**

Daniel Wong is a renowned Asian Designer. He previously worked for the Alexander McQueen design team, and he was the former head textile designer of Versace. His out-of-ordinary design concepts and ingenious fabric have been recognized by Superstar Lady Gaga, Nicki Minaj as well as other celebrities. Daniel has launched an NFT collection "**The Lochy Clan**", inspired by his childhood living in Scotland, as well as the â€œnever give upâ€ adventurer concept. Recently, we invited him to join our PhantaBear AMA to share stories about his art & fashion journey.

Jay has also collaborated with Sothebyâ€™s to become Sotheby's Asia's first auction curator. ğŸ¤–**New bots have arrived** ğŸ¤–
NFT space is moving so fast that it's natural in such a market to feel overwhelmed and that you are missing out. Powerful tools are recommend to use in order to prevent chase high and increase the efficiency of our trading. Therefore PhantaBear Community has decided to bring in the bot system developed by NFTgo for Bearos and Bearsis to use. There is 5 types of Alert ping Bots and 6 types of Command Bots.

Alert ping Bots: 
1. Block-Trades-Alert: You will receive alerts on the trading info that is more than 5ETH.
2. Whale-Trade-Alert: You will receive alerts when whales have trading activities.
3. Daily-Drop-Alert: You will receive alerts on the daily drop info.
4. Top-Mint-15m-Alert: You will receive alerts on the project info with the largest mint activities in the past 15 minutes.
5. Whale-Mint-15m-Alert: You will receive alerts on the project info with the largest whale mint activities in the past 15 minutes.

Command Bots:
1. Check the complete data of a collection: /collection ${slug}
e.g. type /collection art-blocks to check the basic data of ArtBlocks.
2. Check floor price of a collection: /floor ${slug}
e.g. type /floor cryptopunksto check the floor price of CryptoPunks.
3. Check address data: /address ${eth address}
e.g. type /address 0xe052113bd7d7700d623414a0a4585bcae754e9d5to ceck the data of the ETH address.
4. You can also check by ENS domain like /address nftgoio.eth.
5. Check the rarity of an NFT: /rarity-by-collection ${slug} ${token id}
e.g. type /rarity-by-collection cryptopunks 123to check the rarity of CryptoPunks #123.
6. Check the current ETH gas price (Datasource: Etherscan): /gas

NFTgo is one of the very well-known NFT aggregation platform that provide various sources of data.  Other than that, it also provide Chinese language support. Bearos and Bearsis can use this opportunity to make good use of NFTgo.

Phanta Radio EP4 ğŸ“»
PhantaTravel First Station - Malaysia

Selemat Datang ke Malaysia. (Welcome to Malaysia)

Malaysia is a multi-ethnic and multi-cultural country in Southeast Asia. In this episode, We will introduce some famous foods in Malaysia, including nasi lemak, roti canai, chicken rice, laksa, char kuey teow, satay & etc. Some of the cuisines are result of acculturation and assimilation of the local culture. Letâ€™s go together to visit dynamic cities, beautiful beaches, idyllic islands and national parks with wildlife-packed rainforests via Phanta Radio.

We've invited some Bearos from Malaysia to join the podcast to share about local culture, food and tourism. We also welcome you to come on stage to share your Malaysia travel experiences. Let's all enjoy the podcast together this coming Sunday!

**__ğŸ‰ Community Emoji/Sticket ContestğŸ‰ __**

This contest is accepting submissions of both emoji and sticker. Letâ€™s clarify the difference between emoji and sticker in advance. 

A. Emojiï¼šEmoji is smaller in size with a dimension of 108x108 px. Eg <:PHB:980518746261176340> <a:PhantaBear10000_idle:997513876008620122> are examples of emoji.

--â–¶ï¸ Rules--

Please select one of the theme below to start your creation process. There are different themes available for sticker vs emoji. There is no upper limit in the number of submissions you make. 

If you want to submit other ideas, simply choose the â€œotherâ€ category in the form and enter your description.


A.Emoji(108x108)Theme List:

1.GM
2.GN
3.WEN
4.HOH
5.thinking
6.patting head
7.heart
8.quiggling

B.Sticker(320x320)Theme List:

1.GM
2.slap the table
3.awkward
4.STOP
5.scared
6.laser eye bear
7.cheers (with milk tea)
8.tribute to new album 

--â–¶ï¸ Judging Criteria--

Artistry: the overall concordance, coloring and visual of the work

Effort: we give extra points to original hand-drawn work (drawing pad) and animated work. 

Theme: Whether the work is related to PhantaBear. For text-centric work we will consider the coloring and style.

Usefulness: Will this emoji/sticker be used in daily conversation. 

Fun: impress us.

--â–¶ï¸ Submission Format--


A.Sticker
- 320 * 320 pixels
- Transparent background recommended
- Static image shall be in PNG formatï¼ŒAnimation shall be in APNG format.ï¼ˆâš ï¸ Note: gif is not supportedï¼‰
- <512KB 

B.Emoji
-108 * 108 pixels
- <256 KB
- PNGï¼ŒJEPGï¼ŒGIF formats are supported

--â–¶ï¸ Picking the Winners--

We will open up two channels for community voting.

Channel 1: For those who have submitted the full set (8 stickers/8 emoji), you may compete for the "community's favorite" award. We will present the full set in the channel and those will be evaluated as a whole by the community. Winners will be ranked based on community voting.

Channel 2: For those who have not submitted the full set, you may compete for the "best theme award". After initial screening by Admin/Mod team, we will ask the community to vote for the best work for each theme, which emoji/sticker can be voted individually.

To prevent everyone from submitting same type of emoji/sticker (Eg gm, gm). We would like to encourage people to go for different theme by rewarding one winner from each theme. We will open up a form and update in live how many submissions there are for each theme to facilitate the process. 

If there is only one submission for a certain theme, then the contestant will be rewarded if it has gotten more then the average vote across board.

We may have multiple winners from the â€œotherâ€ category depending on the number and quality of submission. Stay creative. 

â€”â–¶ï¸ Prize Distributionâ€”

The budget will be used to purchase prize/distribute eth reward. We estimate that our budge will be around 1.5 eth.

 1. For Sticker/Emojiï¼ŒWe have set the â€œCommunityâ€™s favoriteâ€ award for those who have submitted the entire set of emoji/sticker(8). There will be two set of winners, one for the sticker category and one for the emoji category. Since some prefer eth reward and some prefer physical prize, we offer the participants the options below: ï¼ˆ2*4 total winnersï¼‰

First placeï¼š0.4 eth OR Singapore concert ticket OR 400% Phantabear Magician

Second Placeï¼š0.2 eth OR 400% Phantabear Gold

Third Placeï¼š0.1 eth OR 200% Phantabear Gold

Fourth Place: one year of discord nitro

2. We also have set up the â€œbest theme awardâ€ for those who did not submit the entire set of emoji/sticker. Those who get the highest number of vote for each them will be awarded:

One month of Discord Nitro+ Sticker Artist Roleã€‚

We will raffle choice of an additional 0.1 eth/200% PhantaBear to the â€œbest theme awardâ€ winner. 

Note: One person can win under multiple themes, you may choose to gift additional nitro to friends. If winner of â€œcommunityâ€™s favoriteâ€ award got the highest vote, the prize will be passed down to the next Bearos in line.

Due to limited supply of herocross Phantabear, participants are free to select bear from the same price range in case any of the prize above went out of stock.

**Phanta Radio EP7ğŸ“» **
*PhantaTravel 2nd station - New York City*
New York City, commonly known as "The Big Apple", is located in the southern tip of the state of New York, USA. It is the most populous megacity in the USA, the core of the New York metropolitan area, and one of the largest cities in the world. A cosmopolitan city with a significant influence on economy, commerce, media, politics, education and entertainment. NYC is also known as the "Cultural Capital of the United States", and together with London and Hong Kong, it is known as the "Nylonkong".
What kind of amazing food and tourist attractions will this city with such a profound cultural heritage bring us? We've invited some Bearos from New York to join the podcast to share about local culture, food and tourism. We also welcome you to come on stage to share your NYC travel experiences. Let's all enjoy the podcast together this coming Sunday!

ğŸ» **PetaRush X Phantabear AMA** ğŸ»

PetaRush and PhantaBear have jointly launched 10,000 PhantaBear NFTs, originating from the 2D Phanta Bear into 3D designs, for playing in the game. **Phanta Radio EP16ğŸ“» 
PhantaTravel 4th station - Chicago**
Chicago is the third-most populous city in United State in terms of gross domestic product, after New York City and Los Angeles. It is located in the central part of the North America,  playing an important role in railway and air hub, as well as one of the major financial, futures and commodity trading centers in the United States. Since Chicago was found in 1837, the city has grown over the past 100 years to become one of the most influential metropolises in the world.
What kind of amazing food and tourist attractions will this city with such a profound cultural heritage bring us? We've invited the top dog from U.S.A - Sophie to join the podcast and share about local culture, food and tourism. We also welcome you to come on stage to share your travel experiences in Chicago. Let's all enjoy the podcast together this coming Sunday!

**ENTER THE GRAYCRAFT UNIVERSE
& AWAKEN THE TEMPLAR WITH US**

Since 2009, SMG is the brand thatâ€™s been at the forefront of trends that youâ€™ve trusted for the past 12 years. Starting from a lifestyle label that recognizes the stressful moments and volatile nature even in the grind of of daily life, evolving and evoking a generation of passionate urbanites. 

Weâ€™ve moved from an apparel brand to bringing you just fashion to lifestyle products, camping gear to fulfilling your needs in the web3 universe. 

Our foray into the web3 world is tied with the hope that like-minded brands and friends will get to know SMG as a brand and our beliefs better to keep moving forward, exploring and expanding on new possibilities and opportunities for constant growth of the brand in the virtual universe. With our first ever web3 project, we want to evolve  SMG to build a safe sanctuary for the community to know each other better in a new and positive environment. 

This is also why we chose to partner with GRAYCRAFT for this first project. 

GRAYCRAFT is an NFT project that is building the #Mech3 franchise for the Web3 generation.

Born from GRAYÂ®ï¸, a luxury brand renowned for its cutting-edge designs and futuristic approach, as the first in partnership with Trezor to create the worldâ€™s first luxury crypto hardware wallet. In 2021, GRAYCRAFT was established, building out the GRAYCRAFT Universe, a multidimensional science-fantasy epic that tells the story of mankind meeting its grandest ambitions and rising to its most epic challenges. At the centre of the GRAYCRAFT Universe is the Omega Project, the #Mech3 franchise for the Web3 generation.

JOINING THE JOURNEY 

With common beliefs and roadmaps, we saw so much potential of how the two brands could work together and an exciting leap into this universe, one far far away. This is the journey thus far, with our collaboration launching soon.

Experience Sharing Session - Phantabear Holder Gathering Event SG & Jay Chou Carnival World Tour SG**
